DOC.brief_summary: Determine significant correlation maternal serum magnesium level , maternal neonatal outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: We construct pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic model intravenous magnesium sulfate administer antenatally expectant mother expose fetus aim optimize maternal fetal outcome prevent maternal neonatal overdose morbidity associate current magnesium treatment protocol . Once developed PK/PD model hospital cohort , apply model large exist NICHD database mathematically calculate optimal dosing protocol .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman age 1845 year Magnesium sulfate exposure preeclampsia , tocolysis , neuroprotection Neonates ( male female ) born 2442 week gestation
